X.i.6.I.2.b
.
Letters to Participants Who Are Returned to Duty or Disenrolled
The instructions in Step 1 of the procedure described in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, 6.I.2.a
indicate MSCs must prepare a letter for IDES participants whose service department returned them to duty.  MSCs must follow the instructions in the table below when preparing the letter.
If the participant is ...
Then MSC must compose an ...
returned to
active
duty
IDES Return to Active Service
Letter
.
a member of the Reserves or National Guard and
not
on active duty
IDES Return to Reserves/National Guard Letter
.
discharged administratively under conditions other than honorable
IDES Disenrollment OTH Discharge Letter
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Processing Based on Service Department Outcomes
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I
